arabic: اَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ الَّذِيْ لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الرَّحْمٰنُ الرَّحِيمُ
translation: I seek forgiveness of Allah who is “There is no God save  He”, the Beneficent, the Merciful;
the Ever living, the Eternal, and I turn repentant to Him
transliteration: astaghfirullāhal ladhī lā ilāha illā huwar raḥmānur raḥīm
